name: The Cookie Jar
description:
The Cookie Jar- A Kitchen Mystery

*************************************************************************

Someone stole the cookie from the cookie jar, and now it's up to you to find out who it is. Go around looking for evidence, comparing clues and listening to alibis in this short, one-room mystery game! 

Controls for PC- Use arrow keys to move and to interact with people/objects.

This game is supported on PC and on smartphone. 

Thanks to Bitsy and Adam De Loux for allowing this game to be made. This is my first project made with Bitsy and it took around 3 hours to complete.

Enjoy!
